mapper.select: select t.*,tg.name groupName,tc.name projectName,tu.name userName,tg2.name parentGroupName from t_basecase t left join t_group tg on t.groupId=tg.id left join t_group tg2 on tg.parentGroupId=tg2.id left join t_project tc on tg.projectId=tc.id left join t_user tu on t.userId=tu.id where t.caseId=#{caseId} order by t.sort
mapper.insert:
insert into t_basecase(name,comment,groupId,projectId,userId,status,caseId,kind,sort) values(#{name},#{comment},#{groupId},#{projectId},#{userId},#{status},#{caseId},#{kind},#{sort})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
mapper.update: update t_basecase set sort=sort+1 where sort>#{sort} and caseId=#{caseId}
update t_basecase set sort=sort-1 where sort>#{sort} and caseId=#{caseId}
mapper.select: select IFNULL(MAX(SORT),0) sort from t_basecase t where 1=1 and t.caseId=#{caseId}
